byline.contributor: Gardiner Harris contributed reporting from New Delhi, and Helene Cooper from Washington.
byline.original: By NIDA NAJAR and BHADRA SHARMA

abstract: Nepalese Army helicopters find wreckage of United States Marine UH-1 Huey, ending three-day search for the helicopter, which lost radio communication after 7.3 magnitude earthquake; officials say it is unlikely that any of the six Marines and two Nepali soldiers on board survived.
lead_paragraph: Nepal’s defense chief said that three charred bodies had been found in the wreckage of the helicopter, which vanished Tuesday with six Marines and two Nepalese soldiers aboard.

headline.main: Missing U.S. Marine Helicopter Is Found in Nepal, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Marine Helicopter Wreck Is Found in Remote Nepal

snippet: Nepal’s defense chief said that three charred bodies had been found in the wreckage of the helicopter, which vanished Tuesday with six Marines and two Nepalese soldiers aboard.
